name: Partum Artifex
summary: On your drive, late at night, an old house catches your attention. You stop to soak up the creepy scenery in but you are surprised that there's a light on in the top window. As you approach the house, it suddenly turns off. Maybe investigating the house was a bad idea... maybe not?

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Partum Artifex - Indie Horror Game - No Commentary
